_sText:
Ok this is the fixed version of mg_attack_the_castle i didnt realize that there were so many bugs, so i took out the big boats cuz apparently they killed people :( and i took the grenades out cuz they didnt really help so i hope u enjoy this fixed version.

The Object of the game is to if your T drive your boat the the ct's castle and break down the doors to get to the bomb press the bomb to explode the castle.

Now if your ct u have to shoot down their boats with cannons(made by SolidSnake) to make sure they dont blow you up.
